mapper.select:
select prdt_code, prdt_name, prdt_type from prdt_table
prdt_code = #{prdtCode}

select chk_std_code, chk_name, chk_dt, chk_std from chk_std
chk_std_code = #{chkStdCode}
mapper.insert: insert into prdt_chk_list(chk_std_code, prdt_chk_num, prdt_code, chk_std) values ( #{chkStdCode}, #{prdtChkNum}, #{prdtCode}, #{chkStd} )
mapper.select:
select p.pass_cnt, p.prcs_rs_code, p.prdt_code,
d.prod_inst_code,
i.prod_inst_date from process_result p JOIN process r ON p.prcs_code = r.prcs_code JOIN dt_prod_inst d ON r.dt_prod_inst_code = d.dt_prod_inst_code JOIN prod_inst i ON d.prod_inst_code = i.prod_inst_code
WHERE r.prod_yn = 'y'

SELECT s.chk_name, s.chk_std,
p.prcs_rs_code,
c.chk_std_code, c.prdt_chk_num FROM prdt_chk p JOIN dt_prdt_chk d ON p.prdt_chk_code = d.prdt_chk_code JOIN prdt_chk_list c ON d.chk_std_code = c.chk_std_code JOIN chk_std s ON c.chk_std_code = s.chk_std_code
WHERE c.prdt_code = #{prdtCode} AND p.prcs_rs_code = #{prcsRsCode}
mapper.insert:
select 'PDC' || LPAD(prdt_chk_seq.NEXTVAL, 5, '0') as prdtChkCode from dual
insert into prdt_chk( prdt_chk_code, prdt_code, prcs_rs_code, prdt_chk_date, prdt_chk_cnt, prdt_chk_result ) values ( #{prdtChkCode}, #{prdtCode}, #{prcsRsCode}, #{prdtChkDate}, #{prdtChkCnt}, #{prdtChkResult} )

insert into dt_prdt_chk( prdt_chk_code, prdt_code, chk_std_code, prdt_chk_val, prdt_chk_fit, prdt_manager ) values ( 'PDC' || LPAD(prdt_chk_seq.NEXTVAL, 5, '0'), #{prdtCode}, #{chkStdCode}, #{prdtChkVal}, #{prdtChkFit}, #{prdtManager} )
mapper.select: select * from prdt_chk c JOIN prdt_table t ON c.prdt_code = t.prdt_code

SELECT p.prdt_chk_code, p.prdt_code, p.prcs_rs_code,
c.chk_name, c.chk_std,
d.prdt_chk_val, d.prdt_chk_result
FROM prdt_chk p JOIN dt_prdt_chk d ON p.prdt_chk_code = d.prdt_chk_code JOIN chk_std c ON d.chk_std_code = c.chk_std_code
WHERE p.prdt_chk_code = #{prdtChkCode}
select * from prdt_chk c JOIN prdt_table t ON c.prdt_code = t.prdt_code WHERE c.prdt_chk_result = '적합'
